summary: I RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER IN THE MAIL REGARDING THE CATALYTIC CONVERTER. THE REC ALL INDICATED THAT IF YOU HEAR A KNOCKING IN THE ENGINE THE NEEDED TO CHECK ENGINE TO SEE IF IT WAS DAMAGED DUE TO THE CATALYTIC CONVERTER. I TOOK VEHICLE TO 2 KIA DEALERSHIPS AND BOTH REFUSED TO LOOK AT ENGINE BUT ACKNOWLEDGED THAT IT WAS MAKING KNOCKING NOISE
